MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping is used to load the Contract Revenue Adjustment data from Standardization layer to Pre-Stage layer.
MAPPING.NAME: m_STD_TO_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ_LOAD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Used as a pass through expression and to populate the ETL common Columns
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Extract Records from Contract_Revenue_Adjustment where the Contract_Id maps to those customer_id which are updated for the current delta based on the Processed_Billing_Cycle.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_SC_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJUSTMENT

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
SELECT CRA.CONTRACT_ID, CRA.ACTIVITY_FLAG, CRA.AMOUNT, CRA.EFFECTIVE_DATE, CRA.CREATE_DATE , CRA.DPI_GL_CODE, CRA.INFINIUM_GL_CODE, CRA.CHARGE_CODE, CRA.TAX_DISTRICT, CRA.GEO_CODE, CRA.WIRE_CENTER, CRA.TARIFF, CRA.CHARGE_SEQUENCE, CRA.ADJUSTMENT_TRANSACTION_ID, CRA.USI, CRA.DPI_ENVIRONMENT, CRA.SERVICE_TYPE, CRA.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT, ORA_HASH( NVL(TRIM(CRA.ACTIVITY_FLAG),'NULL')|| NVL(TO_CHAR(CRA.AMOUNT),'NULL') ||NVL(TO_CHAR(CRA.EFFECTIVE_DATE,'mm/dd/yyyy'),'NULL') ||NVL(TRIM(CRA.TAX_DISTRICT),'NULL')||NVL(TRIM(CRA.GEO_CODE),'NULL')||NVL(TRIM(CRA.WIRE_CENTER),'NULL')||NVL(TRIM(CRA.TARIFF),'NULL')|| NVL(TO_CHAR(CRA.USI),'NULL')||NVL(CRA.DPI_ENVIRONMENT,'NULL')||NVL(CRA.SERVICE_TYPE,'NULL')||NVL(CRA.ACCOUNT_SEGMENT,'NULL') ) as ROW_HASH
FROM $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJUSTMENT CRA INNER JOIN $$STD_SCHEMA.CONTRACT CON ON CRA.CONTRACT_ID = CON.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN $$STD_SCHEMA.CUSTOMER CUS ON CON.CUSTOMER_ID = CUS.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN $$STG_SCHEMA.S_PROCESSED_BILLING_CYCLE PBC ON CUS.BILL_CYCLE_ID = PBC.ID WHERE PBC.ETL_CYCLE_ID=$$ETL_CYCLE_ID

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Used as a pass through expression and to populate the ETL common Columns
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_PS_TXN_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJ

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Extract Records from Contract_Revenue_Adjustment where the Contract_Id maps to those customer_id which are updated for the current delta based on the Processed_Billing_Cycle.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_SC_CONTRACT_REVENUE_ADJUSTMENT

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: The mapping parameter to hold the ETL Load User
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_LOAD_USER

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: The mapping parameter for holding the standardized layer schema name.
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$STD_SCHEMA

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: This parameter is used to fetch current ETL Cycle ID
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$ETL_CYCLE_ID

MAPPINGVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: The mapping parameter for holding the Staging layer schema name.
MAPPINGVARIABLE.NAME: $$STG_SCHEMA
